news.title: Webinar on SEO for Lawyers: 2023 Recap & 2024 Outlook With a Look at AI
news.description: Want to unravel the SEO mysteries of 2023 and peek into our 2024 crystal ball? Interested in the outlook of AI in the SEO and digital marketing space? Check out this Justia Webinar.

news.title: Justia Legal Resources: What Was New in 2023
news.description: Read about some of the highlights from what we accomplished this year in expanding our portal of free legal resources. We compiled a legal dictionary, 50-state surveys, and biographies of U.S. Supreme Court Justices, among other projects.
